title: Country Ribs Dinner Recipe Read Reviews (2) Be the first to add a review 5 2 2
directions: Sprinkle ribs with salt and pepper; transfer to a 4-qt. slow cooker. Add potatoes, carrots, celery, onion, water and garlic. Cook, covered, on low 6-8 hours or until meat and vegetables are tender.

Remove meat and vegetables; skim fat from cooking juices. Whisk soup into cooking juices; return meat and vegetables to slow cooker. Cook, covered, 15-30 minutes longer or until heated through. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
